column4: Is there anyone with a bit of NFS experience that can help me with a mounting issue?  I'm a newb, I'm sure it's a simple fix.
Why does my NFS folder not mount?  (this is me being funny)(
try mounting it in a terminal or look at /var/log/syslog or messages
I get no error messages when manually mounting using "mount /home/user/folder" which is linking to my fstab....  but the folder remains empty.... if I manually mount
does "mount | grep nfs" list it after mounting it manually?
yes it's listed but the contents are still empty
wtf....  the file is there now...  one sec, I'm going to reboot the node
